S

setChannels(Channel[]) - Method in class org.jgrapes.core.internal.EventBase
Sets the channels that the event is fired on if no channels are specified explicitly when firing the event (see Manager.fire(Event, Channel...)).
setCompletedEvent(Event, Class<? extends AbstractCompletedEvent>) - Static method in class org.jgrapes.core.events.AbstractCompletedEvent
Convenience method that creates ans sets a completed event for the given event with the given type.
setCompletedEvent(Event) - Method in class org.jgrapes.core.internal.EventBase
Sets the event to be thrown when this event and all events caused by it have been handled.
Start - Class in org.jgrapes.core.events
An event that signals the start of the application.
Start() - Constructor for class org.jgrapes.core.events.Start
Create a new start event and set its completion event to .
start(Component) - Static method in class org.jgrapes.core.Utils
Fires a Start event with an associated Started completion event on the broadcast channel of the given application and wait for the completion of the Start event.
Started - Class in org.jgrapes.core.events
The event that signals the completion of the Start event.
Started(Start) - Constructor for class org.jgrapes.core.events.Started
An event for signaling the completion of the application start.
